list.name: Changes
list.comment:
"Porting TicTacToe-C to C#:
This commit translates the entire TicTacToe-C project to C# for a more modern codebase. All functions and logic have been successfully converted to leverage the features of the C# language. The conversion aims to enhance code readability, maintainability, and extensibility.
Added Features: - Implementation of Console.Clear() for an improved user interface. - Usage of Console.ReadKey(true) for capturing key presses without displaying on the console. - Use of String.Format for improved text formatting.
The project has been successfully compiled and tested in C#. This commit lays the foundation for future developments and expansions of the TicTacToe game in C#."

The project has been successfully compiled and tested in C#. This commit lays the foundation for future developments and expansions of the TicTacToe game in C#."
